page.title: 05The Home Farm Trust at work.
page.content: A resident's day begins from 7am.with breakfast at 8am. 9-12noon is worktime 12-1pm.Lunch,1-5pm.Crafts/leisure,5-6 pm.Dinner,6-10pm.Films/TV.relax & bed. Work includes household,farm & garden jobs.Crafts are leather,metal,needle, cane and woodwork.In the Woodwork Shop Picnic Tables,Benches & Flower Troughs are made.Residents are supervised in their work and learn Patchwork,Sewing, Knitting,Tapestry and Embroidery.Work is sold in the Craft Shop. The garden and greenhouses supply the Home.Crops are organically grown.The Farm has 20 sheep,60 hens,3 goats and kids,9 Glos.Old Spot Pigs and piglets and 5 Beehives.Surplus produce is sold Each resident is given Â£7.30 a week. Activities : Swimming,Ballroom Dancing Horse Riding,Handicapped Olympics and Theatre with Church on Sundays.Each day is packed with fun and enjoyment.
